title: Seasons 19 Crop Rotation Planner How To

tasks.task: Attempt to explain how to use the Crop Rotation Planner for Seasons in Farming Simulator 19 via a video.
subtasks: (Instructional demonstration) Provide a disclaimer about playing on PlayStation 4.
(Mental process) Remind viewers that others on PC may confirm or correct the method.
(Research) Use a spreadsheet on a Mac to track crop rotation history and planning.
(Physical action) Observe and note the crop history for a field (e.g., Field 1) by checking the last two years.
(Data entry) Input the historical crop data into the spreadsheet (vertical format).
(Decision-making) Select the most suitable crops for each planting season (Step 3) considering yield percentages.
(Reiterative process) Repeat crop selection for subsequent years until the rotation plan is complete (Steps 4-8).
(Rotational adjustment) Shift planner entries up after each year to reflect historical data (Step 5).
(Plan expansion) Consider multiple fields and repeat the process for each.
(Acknowledgment) Encourage viewers to confirm the method's accuracy and offer feedback.
(Promotional) Request likes, subscriptions, and a farewell.
